sentences.en: Both begrudge any other kind of dominion held by man over man.
sentences.cn: 两人都抱怨人对人所保有的任何其他形式的统治.
他的酬劳是应得的,你别妒忌.

sentences.en: I am sure the Dark Lord will not begrudge you the girl, Greyback, after what you have done tonight.
sentences.cn: 格雷伯克，你今晚功劳这么大，我相信黑魔王不会舍不得给你这个女孩儿的。

sentences.en: I begrudge every penny I pay in tax.
sentences.cn: 我交税交的每一便士心里都不痛快.

sentences.en: I begrudge spending so much money on train fares.
sentences.cn: 我舍不得把这么多钱花在火车票上.

sentences.en: I certainly don't begrudge him the Nobel Prize.
sentences.cn: 我当然不会嫉妒他得了诺贝尔奖。

sentences.en: I do not begrudge the money I have lost.
It would be cruel to begrudge your sojourn among flowers and fields.
sentences.cn: 如果嫉妒你逗留在鲜花与田野之间,那将是太不近人情的.

sentences.en: She did not begrudge the money spent on her children's education.
sentences.cn: 她对用在孩子们教育上的费用从不吝啬.

sentences.en: That's not to say that we begrudge them anything.
sentences.cn: 曼联最近的运气非常好,但是我相信很快幸运女神就会站到我们这边.

sentences.en: The people she met outside seemed to begrudge her very existence.
sentences.cn: 她在外界遇到的人似乎妒忌她的存在.

sentences.en: They did not begrudge the money spent on their child's education.
sentences.cn: 他们不吝惜把钱花在孩子受教育上.

sentences.en: We don't begrudge your going to Italy.
sentences.cn: 我们并不羡慕你到意大利去.

sentences.en: We should not begrudge our neighbour's richness.
sentences.cn: 我们不应该嫉妒邻人的富有.

sentences.en: Who would begrudge the Iraqi people their long - awaited liberation?
sentences.cn: 有谁愿意让伊拉克人民苦盼已久的自由继续被剥夺?

sentences.en: You surely don't begrudge him his happiness.
sentences.cn: 你肯定不是嫉妒他的幸福吧。

words.tran_cn: 羡慕，嫉妒；吝惜，舍不得给

trans.tran_cn: 嫉妒, 羡慕, 舍不得给
trans.tran_en: to feel angry or upset with someone because they have something that you think they do not deserve

trans.tran_cn: 嫉妒，勉强做，不乐意地付出，吝惜
trans.tran_en: to feel angry or upset with someone because they have something that you think they do not deserve
